name.description: Display name of the archetype shown to players.

description.description: Brief description of the archetype's characteristics and role.

isStarter.description: Whether this archetype can be selected as a starting option for new characters.

startingAttributes.description: Initial values for strength, agility, and intelligence at character creation.

attributeGrowthPerLevel.description: Amount each primary attribute increases per level gained.

startingResourceCaps.description: Initial maximum health and mana values at character creation.

resourceGrowthPerLevel.description: Amount maximum health and mana increase per level gained.

skills.description: List of skills available to this archetype with their starting levels.

passives.description: List of passive ability IDs granted by this archetype.

growthModifier.description: Multiplier affecting overall character growth rate.

base.description: Base growth multiplier applied at all levels.

perLevel.description: Additional growth multiplier added per level.

strength.description: Physical power attribute affecting melee damage and carrying capacity.

agility.description: Dexterity attribute affecting accuracy, dodge chance, and movement speed.

intelligence.description: Mental attribute affecting spell power, mana capacity, and skill learning.

maxHealth.description: Maximum hit points the character can have.

maxMana.description: Maximum mana points available for casting spells and abilities.
